General.Name: Sinocat Environmental Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinocat Environmental Technology Co.,Ltd. operates as a high-tech company, primarily focus on the research, development, production, and sale of new materials and new energy in China. It offers gasoline vehicle exhaust gas, and diesel engine purification catalyst; CNG/LNG/LPG exhaust gas purification catalyst; motorcycle and general machine catalyst; and gasoline car catalytic converter. The company also provides retrofitting catalysts with automobiles, which includes gasoline vehicle exhaust aftertreatment system, exhaust gas treatment system for diesel, natural gas bus SCR exhaust gas after-treatment, remote online monitoring platform, Bilan app, and exhaust gas modification service for in-use vehicle in the aftermarket. In addition, it offers VOCs exhaust gas solution; catalyst for post-treatment of ship exhaust gas; and hydrogen fuel cell products, such as electrocatalyst and membrane electrode. Further, the company provides energy and power battery including energy storage lithium battery, vehicle and consumer electronic battery, robot and medical device lithium battery, and car start-stop battery. Sinocat Environmental Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
